EmailTemplate.name: Solstice - CS - Application Receipt
EmailTemplate.subject: Community Solar Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your Community Solar application. You should receive notice on your application status within the next two business days. Upon application approval, we will send you final documentation to complete your enrollment into our Community Solar program.
In the meantime, if you have any questions, feel free to e-mail us at info@bluewave-capital.com or give us a call at 617-418-4001.
Sincerely,
The Customer Care Team
